Introduction

Jo Kwon is a South Korean singer, actor, TV host, and musical actor under Archive Achim. He is best known as the leader of the group 2AM, as well as a member of the project groups Dramatic BLUE and Triple T.

He made his official group debut on July 11, 2008 with 2AM's single "This Song". In June of 2010 he made his debut as a soloist with the release of his first digital single "The Day I Confessed".
